scripts.test:execute: STAGE_NAME=test IS_OFFLINE=true npx dotenv -e .env.test -- tap test --jobs=1 --node-arg=--require=ts-node/register --disable-coverage --allow-empty-coverage
scripts.test:prepare: docker compose up -d mariadb-test && npm run dynamodb:kill && sleep 10 && npm run dynamodb:start:test && sleep 10 && npx dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.test: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:execute && npm run dynamodb:kill && docker compose stop mariadb-test
scripts.test:ci: npm run dynamodb:start:test && sleep 60 && npm run test:execute
scripts.test:coverage:execute: STAGE_NAME=test IS_OFFLINE=true npx dotenv -e .env.test -- tap test --jobs=1 --node-arg=--require=ts-node/register
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:coverage:execute && npm run dynamodb:kill && docker compose stop mariadb-test
scripts.test:filter:execute: STAGE_NAME=test IS_OFFLINE=true npx dotenv -e .env.test -- tap test --jobs=1 --grep="$npm_config_filter" --node-arg=--require=ts-node/register --disable-coverage
scripts.test:filter: npm run test:prepare && npm run test:filter:execute && npm run dynamodb:kill && docker compose stop mariadb-test
